wiki.summary: "my hair" is the eighth track from Ariana Grande's sixth studio album, Positions. It was released on October 30, 2020 through Republic Records. On "my hair", Ariana lets her hair down as she gets intimate with a lover. Permitting her partner to touch her hair puts her in an honest and vulnerable position. Still, she's comfortable and willing enough to do it. One of Ariana's most notable features is her signature high ponytail; in this song, she embraces her natural curls and opens up a special part of herself to someone she loves. Read more on Last.fm.
